CustomField.description:
The e-mail sent to the client that is doing a Public Subscription Recurring Acquisition is different depending on this field. If the box is ticked in “Yes”, the user will receive an e-mail that indicates that he has to manually recharge the card.
If the box is ticked in “No” the user receives an e-mail confirming that his subscription was successfully acquired.
CustomField.label: Manual Recharge
